text: Meshulim Feish Segal Lowy II (, Magyarized: Lőwy Ferencz; 11 April 1921 – 12 August 2015) was a Hungarian-Canadian rabbi. He was the fourth Grand Rebbe of the Tosh hasidic dynasty. Rabbi Lowy died in Quebec, Canada from pneumonia at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Canadian Jews Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Disease-related deaths in Quebec Category:Holocaust survivors Category:Hungarian Jews Category:Naturalized citizens of Canada Category:Rabbis
title: Meshulim Feish Lowy
